name: Arceus LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Multitype
poke_body.effect: Arceus LV.X‘s type is the same as its previous Level.

attacks.name: Meteor Blast
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack’s base damage is 50 instead of 100.

rule_box:
Put this card onto your Active Arceus. Arceus LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
You may have as many of this card in your deck as you like.
